explains: adv. 按照法律，法律上；合法地
wordGroup: legally binding 有法律约束力；受法律约束

sentences.en: A gambling debt is not legally enforceable.
sentences.cn: 赌债不能通过法律手段强制偿还。

sentences.en: It could be a bit problematic, legally speaking.
sentences.cn: 从法律上说，可能是有点问题。

sentences.en: The liquor was sold legally and trucked out of the state.
sentences.cn: 这种酒合法出售，由卡车运出该州。
